meanings.definition: A thick-walled sexual spore formed from the fusion of two gametes.
meanings.sent1: The zygospores were created when two tiny cells joined together.
meanings.sent2: Under the microscope, the zygospores appeared as round structures with thick walls.
meanings.sent3: The zygospores decided to throw a party to celebrate their union.
meanings.sent4: The zygospores were like a fortress, protecting the genetic material within.
meanings.sent5: In the garden of life, the zygospores were the seeds of new beginnings.

meanings.definition: A resting spore produced by certain fungi and algae through the fusion of gametes.
meanings.sent1: After a period of growth, the zygospores entered a dormant phase.
meanings.sent2: The pond was teeming with zygospores waiting for the right conditions to germinate.
meanings.sent3: The zygospores decided to take a nap and rest for a while.
meanings.sent4: The zygospores were like tiny time capsules, preserving life until the time was right.
meanings.sent5: In the calm waters, the zygospores floated peacefully, ready to bloom when needed.
